details.title: An Optimum Phase Synchronizer in a Partially Coherent Receiver
details.abstract: The derivation and the statistical properties of the maximum a posteriori probability phase estimator of a sinusoidal signal in white Gaussian noise are considered. The probability density function of the phase estimate is developed. The estimator efficiency and performance as a phase synchronizer in a partially coherent receiver are calculated and compared with a first-order phase-locked loop phase estimator.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
